name: Terrible Pong Remake
description:
This is just a terrible remake of Pong that I made within 10 minutes. I've been wanting to upload a game for a while now and here you go, a terrible remake of Pong! I'm not sure if I'll update this since it's just a mess around project. But try and enjoy (I guess). It is a 2 Player game and the controls are:

Player 1 (left):

W & S: Up and Down

Player 2:

Arrow Up & Down: Up and Down
